description: The round payoff this round was 81. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 40.5.
The round payoff is split evenly when both players choose option 1
Choosing option 1 when the other player also chooses option 1 maximizes the payoff for each player in a round
The game allows for strategic adaptation based on the opponent's previous actions
